website_summaries.verdict: Convenient mats from a popular baking mat company known for their quality and durability.
pros: Silicone over fiberglass construction with exceptional non-stick properties
Professional-quality mats for home cooks who want to make their jelly roll pans non-stick
cons: May stain if you don't clean them right away

customer_reviews.title: Left Residue
customer_reviews.text: I had the same issue as many others here. Part of the mats seem to have transferred onto my pans. I made cookies on them. The cookies turned out great and didn't stick which was great, but I was disappointed to see marks on my new pans when I lifted the mats off.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: France IS the cooks capital.
customer_reviews.text: This product is FAR superior to any of the Chinese knock-offs. I had purchased similar baking mats from Amazon a number of years ago. The immediate problem was staining creeping into the mats from the edges. These imports had cut the mats once they were formed but failed to seal the edges, thereby exposing the fiber mat along all the edges. Over time the silicon failed and no longer releases the burned on food, etc. Even if scrubbed.
customer_reviews.author: Fugu

customer_reviews.title: These are not real Silpats!
customer_reviews.text: These are quite obviously not silpats. They look nothing like the photographs shown here in this listing either. I am quite unhappy as I paid real money for these unreal mats.
customer_reviews.author: Jen N.

customer_reviews.title: Are these Silpat? No. Do they work like Silpat? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for baking bread. They work realy good. I,m not stuck with brand names means quality. These are just as good as Silpat at half the price. I know these are made in China and not in France, but who cares if quality is same.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Ulm

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Only one of my mats came with this set of two but amazon quickly handled this problem and got my other mat sent out. I love these for all sorts of baking projects. And even with meal prep. They are easy to clean and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing, perfect nonstick liners I have ever had the pleasure of using! Super high quality, very easy to use, very easy to clean (should that become necessary, which it generally isn't). Of all the long-term investments I've made in my kitchen, these are the best. I can't praise them enough!
customer_reviews.author: g$

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: I love how these mats distribute the heat and cook my items evenly. They also protect my food from absorbing the aluminum in my cookie sheets. Friends tell me they will feel greasy/sticky over time, but I'll plan to clean them. That little inconvenience does not outweigh their performance.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Think and strong
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Kevlar baking sheet better than silicone alone! Had them many years til worn out due to my kids cut food with knife. Never cut with knife! Move food to plate to cut it. Kevlar is fiber glass.
customer_reviews.author: C. Norwich

customer_reviews.title: Makes Baking a Breeze
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to clean cookie sheets. I don't have to grease them. I LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana George

customer_reviews.title: great pan liners
customer_reviews.text: we use these & parchment paper & by far, the pan liners are my favorite...nothing sticks, cookies brown nicely & cleanup is a breeze...
customer_reviews.author: clapton

customer_reviews.title: Sasa DeMarle Half Sheet Baking Mats
customer_reviews.text: The best money can buy for any silicone baking needs is Sasa DeMarle. The coolies that come from this product are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: GMJM

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand of silpat
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! Super excited to continue baking with this in hand. Saves parchment paper for the most part!
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my 2 old Silpats. They are the same like my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Makes baking so much better! It's cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Makes baking so much better! It's cleaner, the mats provide a great surface to bake on and don't burn the bottom of my bread and cookies!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Remeny

customer_reviews.title: awesome baking mat
customer_reviews.text: Awesome baking mat, there are cheaper immatations out there, but this is the real deal. cleans up well. So far so good,
customer_reviews.author: Robert McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I hated this,it's horrible to clean. Everything stuck to it, waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't bake without them
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for years. My old one finally gave out on me after 15 years. Got 2 of them this time.
customer_reviews.author: AG Rios

customer_reviews.title: No messy pans to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who does all the cooking. These are to replace some that we have had for a VERY LONG time.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good but ...,
customer_reviews.text: Good product .. this item not as good as Williams Sonoma silpat.
customer_reviews.author: watercolor

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long????
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible for baking. I've wanted a silpat for years and years and never bought myself one. So happy I finally got it! NOTHING sticks to it. I'll save in foil, parchment and Pam Spray.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Santoro

customer_reviews.title: Best Baking Tool
customer_reviews.text: These are the best baking tool you can have in your kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T.

customer_reviews.title: hoping this set is the same great quality.
customer_reviews.text: The first set took 20 years to wear out, hoping this set is the same great quality.
customer_reviews.author: TammyLeoral

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since parchment paper
customer_reviews.text: Been using parchment for years love these works the same and no waste!!!
customer_reviews.author: CAROL A L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a Christmas gift based on using a set for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: BCFR710

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best.
customer_reviews.text: Legit, would buy 7 more times if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: travis

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for half sheet trays. Very well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: These Are Not Silpat
customer_reviews.text: I don't really know Silpat, but the Silpat website shows Silpat logos on their products. These are completely unmarked. If I wanted generic baking mats, I would have paid half the price. Baking on synthetic material is unnerving to begin with. Baking on unlabeled synthetic material sold falsely and shipped from a country with known quality control issues (China) is untenable. I'm returning these. My order was fulfilled by Bouga.
customer_reviews.author: nothin doin

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother wasting your time
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Silpat as shown in picture. False advertisement. Order took 2 months to receive. Once it FINALLY arrived, it was NOT the Silpat brand like in pic, it was a flimsy generic look a alike. Major disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a Silpat. That is not what arrived. Bait and switch, it's a knock off. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Silpats: Highly Valuable Kitchen Essentials
customer_reviews.text: I use these Silpats with Nordic Ware aluminum half sheet baking pans when baking cookies. Together, they have improved the uneven baking properties of my crappy oven and have reduced kitchen stress because they are easy to clean and use. Why did I wait so long? I wonder. Definitely money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Wilma Jean

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: If you bake a lot, you know when you need to use these and when you can go without. They are worth having on hand. I've tried the fake ones, but Silpats are the gold standard; they haven't changed since I've had mine (2007). Good addition to a baker's gift basket.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Bayham

customer_reviews.title: It works great and lasts a long long long time.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it’s best to just go with the original. I’ve tried other cheaper brands and got what I paid for. Silpat is the only one I will ever buy from now on. Will it wear out? Sure, but it will easily last about ten times longer than anything else.
customer_reviews.author: J Mac

customer_reviews.title: Replaced all my parchment paper for baking.
customer_reviews.text: I was at first skeptical that these mats would replace my high grade parchment paper but they work perfectly. I bake several batches of cookies twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I think that you get what you pay for in Silpat sheets. I use mine several times a week. My last pair lasted over 15 years. I hang mine, after washing, on a skirt hangar to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes them
customer_reviews.text: I got these after seeing a review on America test kitchen tv show. My wife bakes a lot of cookies for the grandkids and was using Parchment paper which can get expensive
customer_reviews.author: rusty

customer_reviews.title: Silicone baking mats
customer_reviews.text: Owned for years, first purchase finally cracked and no longer able to use after 5 plus years. I have zero complaints about a product that can withstand the abuse recieved from years of heating, cooling and freezing.
customer_reviews.author: HonEbadg

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The best addition to my kitchen in a while. Saves a lot of foil. I just wish it came in a molded version with sidewalls so I could roast cuts of chicken or bacon and still keep the pan clean.
customer_reviews.author: AJ McGarry

customer_reviews.title: One of a baker's most necessary tools
customer_reviews.text: Would not bake a cookie or biscuit without it!! I have had mine for 16 years. Purchased this one to replace my daughter-in-law's. Every kitchen should have a couple!! They make baking so much better!!! THanks!
customer_reviews.author: 1Good SLP

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: How did I bake some much without this thing? This is amazing! No need for oil. I’ve roasted vegetables to baking granola on this mat and it’s all worked wonderfully. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for aging cookie sheets
customer_reviews.text: My cookie sheets have been abused and foods were sticking. These have solved the problem and cookies are again turning out perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: d&sdinkel

customer_reviews.title: Work great to roast vegetables
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No more parchment paper. I’ve only used to roast vegetables or bake potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D

customer_reviews.title: Best baking sheet on the market
customer_reviews.text: love the silpat brand. Its sturdy and very durable. I tried other brands, but they're flimsy and hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Curran

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and superior to other similar brands. I highly recommend Silpat baking mats.
customer_reviews.author: gbnom

customer_reviews.title: These are a wonderful alternative to expensive parchment paper
customer_reviews.text: These are a wonderful alternative to expensive parchment paper. We roast fries, veggies, etc...with no oil and they come out crispy on our Silpat.
customer_reviews.author: ViolinMommy

product_meta.title: Silpat Half Size 11.6 x 16.5 Inch Nonstick Baking Mat for 13 x 18 Inch Pans, Set of 2
product_meta.description:
Bake without having to worry about your creations sticking to the pan with this Silpat baking mat set. Made of silicone and reinforced with fiberglass mesh, they are heat resistant up to 480 degrees. Great for rolling or kneading dough, sugar, chocolate or flatbreads, each is nonstick so your food will slide right off. With a silver coating on either side for better counter grip, they even rolls up for compact storage.

11-5/8" L x 16-1/2" W; Fits 13" L x 18" W pans
feature_bullets: Made of silicone and reinforced with fiberglass mesh
Silver coating on either side for better counter grip

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars166 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
